mapper.select:
select b.board_no as board_no , b.member_id as member_id , m.member_nm as member_nm , b.board_title as board_title , b.board_content as board_content , b.board_hits as board_hits , b.board_savedfile as board_savedfile , b.board_originfile as board_originfile , to_char(b.board_indate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as board_indate from board b, member m where b.member_id = m.member_id
and b.board_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by board_no desc

select b.board_no board_no , m.member_id member_id , m.member_nm member_nm , b.board_title board_title , b.board_content board_content , b.board_hits board_hits , b.board_savedfile board_savedfile , b.board_originfile board_originfile , to_char(b.board_indate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as board_indate from board b, member m where b.member_id = m.member_id and b.board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.update: update board set board_hits = 1 + board_hits where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from board
where board_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

select r.reply_no as reply_no , r.board_no as board_no , r.reply_content as reply_content , r.member_id as member_id , m.member_nm as member_nm , to_char(r.reply_indate, 'yy-MM-dd hh:mm') as reply_indate from reply r, member m where r.board_no = #{board_no} and m.member_id = r.member_id order by reply_no asc
